item.title: (ill)Health
item.description: Ill health is commonly reported by those living with damp conditions. While this can often referr to specific conditions such as [[asthma]], [[eczema]], [[mental-health|mental health problems]], and more, also endured is a more generalised, non-specific poor quality of health.
